topsecretsci.description: The color used to indicate the Top Secret/SCI classification.

topsecret.description: The color used to indicate the Top Secret classification.

secret.description: The color used to indicate the Secret classification.

confidential.description: The color used to indicate the Confidential classification.

cui.description: The color used to indicate the CUI classification.

unclassified.description: The color used to indicate the Unclassified classification.

default.description: The background color of base elements, like the app or popup menus.

hover.description: The background color of base elements, like popup menus, when they are hovered over. #142435

default.description: The background color of surface panels.

header.description: The background color for the header of surface elements, including dialog and table headers.

selected.description: Used to show the selected state of a surface background

hover.description: The background color of base elements, like popup menus, when they are hovered over.

default.description: The primary color used for interactive elements.

hover.description: The hover color used for interactive elements.

primary.description: The primary color used for text within the application.

secondary.description: The color used for text when less emphasis is needed.

placeholder.description: The text color used for placeholder text in input and form fields.

inverse.description: The color used for text on reversed backgrounds.

default.description: The primary color used for interactive elements.

hover.description: The hover color used for interactive elements.

white.description: Text that is white across all themes. Used for classification and status banners that do not change color in various themes. #ffffff

black.description: Text that is black across all themes. Used for classification and status banners that do not change color in various themes. #000000

error.description: The text color used for errors. #ff3838

default.description: The primary color used for interactive elements.

hover.description: The hover color used for interactive elements.

muted.description: A muted version of the primary color used for interactive elements that don't need to be as strong as the primary color.

critical.description: Used to represent the Critical Status.

serious.description: Used to represent the Serious Status.

caution.description: Used to represent the Caution Status.

normal.description: Used to represent the Normal Status.

standby.description: Used to represent the Standby Status.

off.description: Used to represent the Off Status.

muted.description: A muted version of the primary color used for interactive elements that don't need to be as strong as the primary color.

circle.description: A completely rounded border radius, used to create circles.

display-1.description: Display 1. Custom element. Used for Splash Screens.

display-2.description: Display 2. Custom element. Used for Splash Screens.

monospace-1.description:
Monospace 1
Used for Global Status Bar clock.

normal.description: Inner shadow for normal status Tags

critical.description: Inner shadow for critical status Tags

off.description: Inner shadow for off status Tags

topsecretsci.description: The color used to indicate the Top Secret/SCI classification.

topsecret.description: The color used to indicate the Top Secret classification.

secret.description: The color used to indicate the Secret classification.

confidential.description: The color used to indicate the Confidential classification.

critical.description: The color used for icons in Critical status banners.

serious.description: The color used for icons in Serious status banners.

caution.description: The color used for icons in Caution status banners.

normal.description: The color used for icons in Normal status banners.

standby.description: The color used for icons in Standby status banners.

off.description: The color used for icons in Off status banners.

critical.description: The color used for the background on Critical status banners.

serious.description: The color used for the background on Serious status banners.

caution.description: The color used for the background on Caution status banners.

normal.description: The color used for the background on Normal status banners.

standby.description: The color used for the background on Standby status banners.

off.description: The color used for the background on Off status banners.

critical.description: The color used to indicate items with a Critical status. Critical, error, alert, emergency, urgent.

serious.description: The color used to indicate items with a Serious status. Serious, warning, needs attention.

caution.description: The color used to indicate items with a Caution status. Caution, unstable, unsatisfactory.

normal.description: The color used to indicate items with a Normal status. Normal, on, ok, fine, go, satisfactory, success.

standby.description: The color used to indicate items with a Standby status. Standby, available, enabled.

off.description: The color used to indicate items with an Off status. Off, unavailable, disabled.

critical.description: The border color used for the Critical status symbol. Transparent in Dark Theme.

serious.description: The border color used for the Serious status symbol. Transparent in Dark Theme.

caution.description: The border color used for the Caution status symbol. Transparent in Dark Theme.

normal.description: The border color used for the Normal status symbol. Transparent in Dark Theme.

standby.description: The border color used for the Standby status symbol. Transparent in Dark Theme.

off.description: The border color used for the Off status symbol. Transparent in Dark Theme.

fill.description: The primary color used for interactive elements in the Global Status Bar.

background.description: The background color of the Global Status Bar component.

text.description: The primary text color used within the Global Status Bar.
